overview: In the past 10 years, Thousand Foot Krutch has made a name for themselves with rock anthems like "Rawkfist", "Move", "Falls Apart", and many many others while selling well over 650,000 albums in their career thus far. This LIVE album will feature some bonus material as well as a LIVE concert of Thousand Foot Krutch.
title: Live at the Masquerade
